channel.title: featured on HarvestX
channel.description: Recent content in featured on HarvestX

item.title: HarvestX | Member Detail
item.description: Aoi Watanabe is mainly in charge of software for robots using ROS/ROS2 at HarvestX. Aoi graduated the Department of Materials Engineering, the University of Tokyo. Before entering UTokyo, Aoi studied mechanical and electrical engineering at National Institute Technology, Tokuyama College and received the Hatakeyama Prize from the Japan Society of Mechanical Engineers upon graduation.

item.title: HarvestX | Member Detail
item.description: Yuki Ichikawa is a founder of HarvestX, an engineer who acquired a bachelor of computer science at Chiba Institute of Technology. Currently working as the CEO of HarvestX. Embedded system engineering and factory automation design as a freelance engineer.Hardware design and launching mass production at Cookpad Inc. Selected as a challenger for the 2020 “Inno-vation Disruptive Challenge” category.Certificated as a “未踏スーパークリエイター(Mito super creator)” in 2019.
